item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Scaling up linear programming with PDLP (118 points | 25 comments)
2. Ultra high-resolution image of The Night Watch (385 points | 110 comments)
3. X capitulates to Brazil's Supreme Court (36 points | 14 comments)

6. LHC experiments at CERN observe quantum entanglement at the highest energy yet (3 points | discuss)
7. Mount Unix system into Common Lisp image (47 points | 8 comments)
8. What 10k Hours of Coding Taught Me: Don't Ship Fast (67 points | 37 comments)
9. Kraftful (YC S19) is hiring a founder engineer ( | hide)
10. Forget ChatGPT: why researchers now run small AIs on their laptops (287 points | 193 comments)

13. Visualizing Weather Forecasts Through Landscape Imagery (545 points | 53 comments)

23. Gibbons move with rhythm and intention. Dare we say style? (9 points | 2 comments)
24. MemoRAG – Enhance RAG with memory-based knowledge discovery for long contexts (170 points | 29 comments)
25. Redis users considering alternatives after licensing move (16 points | 1 comment)
26. Remains of Egyptian army barracks and a bronze sword unearthed by archaeologists (37 points | 5 comments)
27. Counting Sheeps with Contracts in Python (21 points | 14 comments)

29. Porsche's idea for a six-stroke internal combustion engine (146 points | 289 comments)
